title: Pret A Manger - Heathrow Airport
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe chain offering vegan choices for breakfast including fruit salad, smoothies, bottled raw juices  non-dairy cacao, nut and banana shakes, five-grain porridge, coconut milk yoghurt with granola. Lunch include falafel and hummus salad, artichoke and red pepper baguette, chickpea wrap, and others.
streetAddress: Departures Gate Seating Level, Heathrow Terminal 5
